title: ‘Thanks Doug’: The Viral Video Game Exposing the Perils of Removing Toronto’s Bike Lanes
content:
There is no way to survive Canadian artist Marie LeBlanc Flanagan's 'Loser Lane.' And that's exactly the point.

Read the full article at ‘Thanks Doug’: The Viral Video Game Exposing the Perils of Removing Toronto’s Bike Lanes on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
